p: In the case of infectious diseases such as Herpes Zoster (VHZ), there is a 14% increased risk of outbreaks, especially in males, with overexposure to UVR, due to the immunosuppression it produces [ 8, 101]. The average cost of treatment varies between 301.5 and 916.7 euros/outbreak, depending on its complication [ 102], with an estimated incidence of 60,000 cases/year [ 103].
